original_text: If your friend still will not agree that he has done something wrong, then go and tell the church leaders. If he does not agree with the leaders, stop being his friend. He is like somebody who refuses to obey God.
korean_text: 만일 그들의 말도 듣지 않거든 교회에 말하고 교회의 말도 듣지 않거든 이방인과 세리와 같이 여기라

sentences.original_text: If your friend still will not agree
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너의 친구가 여전히 동의하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: that he has done something wrong
then go and tell the church leaders
If he does not agree with the leaders
